item.title: Tar
item.description:
TAR Integration

Overview

The TAR integration allows to import data into a Kloset from a tarball. This integration is bundled with Plakar since 1.0.3.

Configuration

The TAR integration does not require any special configuration.

Example Usage

To back up, you can use the following commands which will copy the content of the stdio stream to a file named passwd within the snapshot:

1$ plakar at /var/backups backup tgz:foobar.tar.gz
